creator: rstill@canada.com
text:
hello;
I would like to request a small change to the documentation. 
On the page
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/platform/windows.html
under testing the Installation, two test URL's are given:
 http://localhost/
and
 http://127.0.0.1/. 
At least if apache is listening on port 8080, the port must be explicitly
entered as part of the URL. (I don't know about port 80, I didn't set it up that
way) 
Could these test URLs be changed to show the port number, or a note made of
this. I know it would have saved me a lot of time. 
Thanks 
Ray
P.S. (I'm unsure of the priority level, so I left it at the default)

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text:
I'm not sure that this is a common problem, but it's easy enough to add a quick
remark about it.
I've added a remark to that effect. Thanks.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
